fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- At least one Inquisition Killing role must spawn.
- Factional chat
- No factional kill unless no Killing members are alive.
- If a condemned player is lynched, all members may Prosecute the next night. This allows them to either deal an Astral Unstoppable attack, two Basic attacks, or a rampaging Powerful attack. 
- If a member is roleblocked while Prosecuting, they stay home and attack all visitors.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid the town of heretics and nonbelievers.
